attributes.action: Instruct the FA to appoint Jose Mourinho as England's new manager
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the disgrace of the Euro 2008 qualifiers, England needs a new manager who has the experience, ability and attitude to turn the team back into winners. There is only one manager worthy of that task, the special one, Jose Mourinho. The FA should appoint him manager/coach immediately!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
